sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-view/>
</template>


<script>
import { mapState, mapActions } from 'vuex'

export default {
    name: 'App',
    computed: {
        ...mapState({
            alert: state => state.alert
        })
    },
    methods: {
        ...mapActions({
            clearAlert: 'alert/clear' 
        })
    },
    watch: {
        $route (to, from){
            // clear alert on location change
            this.clearAlert();
        }
    } 
};
</script>

<style>

</style>
